content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_brick_wall
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 53, "index": 15}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 36, "index": 22}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "structure_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}]

thought: To craft the stone_brick_wall, I need to place 6 stone_bricks in a 2x3 arrangement in the crafting grid. The first stone_brick needs to be placed in slot 1. There are 6 stone_bricks in slot 32, so I will move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1
